Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli

Annotation Interface CliArgument

@Target(FIELD) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface CliArgument
Annotation to declare arguments for the command line.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    argumentHint
    The name of the argument, used for help messages.
    String
    description
    The description of this argument to be used in help messages.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    int
    index
    The position at which the argument is expected in the input arguments.

  • Element Details

    • argumentHint

      String argumentHint
      The name of the argument, used for help messages.

    • description

      String description
      The description of this argument to be used in help messages.

    • index

      int index
      The position at which the argument is expected in the input arguments.
      Default:
      0
